display_long_description:
# Mixed Reality Game of the Year (The Elite Institute)

# Nominee for Best Mixed Reality Game (UploadVR)

Construct an epic base and battle for peace in Crystal Commanders, an RTS game for mixed and virtual reality!

# Welcome to Update 2.0: Fire and Ice!

The biggest update yet, with TONS of new content to enjoy.

**New Map: Frozen Fortress**
[media]

**New Map: Mount Magma**
[media]

**New Units: Demo Bot and Repair Drone**
[media]

And more!
- New factory (and unit reorg)
- Text localization: French, German, Spanish, Japanese
- New music
- Harder AI
- Basic voice chat

# Mixed reality RTS action

Take charge of your forces, expand your defenses, and engage enemies in rapid skirmishes using unique, expressive controls. Deploy a diverse array of vehicles, towers, and contraptions to thwart a planetary threat, all from the universe of your living room!

[media]

**Battle anytime, anywhere:**

Not in a good spot for MR? Jump into one of the included VR maps and play any mode wherever you want! Supports Meta Quest 2, 3 and 3S!

[media]

**Action-packed story campaign:**

Join Castor and the other members of the Crystal Vanguard as they push back the crafty Crimson Blade in an epic, fully voiced campaign that dynamically adapts to your room!

[media]

**Challenge a friend to the ultimate RTS battle:**

Put your base building skills to the ultimate test in 1v1 multiplayer, battling with friends locally in MR or remotely in VR!

# Mixed reality RTS action

Take charge of your forces, expand your defenses, and engage enemies in rapid skirmishes using unique, expressive controls. Deploy a diverse array of vehicles, towers, and contraptions to thwart a planetary threat, all from the universe of your living room!

Join Castor and the other members of the Crystal Vanguard as they push back the crafty Crimson Blade in an epic, fully voiced campaign that dynamically adapts to your room!
